posts.content: Get a full fake REST API with zero coding in less than 30 seconds (seriously). Created with <3 for front-end developers who need a quick back-end for prototyping and mocking. Egghead.io free video tutorial - Creating demo APIs with json-server. JSONPlaceholder - Live running version. My JSON Server - no installation required, use your own data.
